name: withClock
signature: { <C extends Clock.Clock>(clock: C): <A, E, R>(effect: Effect<A, E, R>) => Effect<A, E, R>; <C extends Clock.Clock, A, E, R>(effect: Effect<A, E, R>, clock: C): Effect<A, E, R>; }
description:
